high_priority_github_issues.title: CRITICAL: ToolDispatcher is stub implementation
high_priority_github_issues.description: The ToolDispatcher at apps/backend/src/core/tools/tool_dispatcher.py is a stub that was restored to fix corruption. This is a critical system component that handles tool routing. Estimated effort: 24h

high_priority_github_issues.title: CRITICAL: Error handler raises NotImplementedError
high_priority_github_issues.description: The error handler at apps/backend/src/core/error/error_handler.py is not implemented and raises NotImplementedError. This blocks proper error handling across the system. Estimated effort: 8h

high_priority_github_issues.title: HIGH: HSP Fallback protocols are all stubs
high_priority_github_issues.description: All fallback protocols (InMemory, FileBased, HTTP) in apps/backend/src/core/hsp/fallback/fallback_protocols.py are stubs. This prevents resilient communication. Estimated effort: 20h

high_priority_github_issues.title: HIGH: VisionToneInverter is placeholder
high_priority_github_issues.description: The entire VisionToneInverter module at apps/backend/src/modules_fragmenta/vision_tone_inverter.py is a placeholder. Vision tone inversion is not functional. Estimated effort: 16h

high_priority_github_issues.title: HIGH: ElementLayer is placeholder
high_priority_github_issues.description: The entire ElementLayer module at apps/backend/src/modules_fragmenta/element_layer.py is a placeholder. Element processing is not functional. Estimated effort: 16h

high_priority_github_issues.title: HIGH: Image generation returns placeholder URLs
high_priority_github_issues.description: Image generation tool at apps/backend/src/tools/image_generation_tool.py returns via.placeholder.com URLs instead of generating actual images. Need to integrate Stable Diffusion or DALL-E. Estimated effort: 20h

high_priority_github_issues.title: HIGH: Memory importance scorer returns hardcoded values
high_priority_github_issues.description: Memory importance scorer at apps/backend/src/ai/memory/importance_scorer.py returns hardcoded 0.5 instead of actual scoring. This affects memory prioritization. Estimated effort: 12h

high_priority_github_issues.title: HIGH: HAM memory utilities are placeholders
high_priority_github_issues.description: Multiple HAM utility functions at apps/backend/src/ai/memory/ham_utils.py are placeholder implementations. HAM memory operations are not functional. Estimated effort: 16h

high_priority_github_issues.title: HIGH: System tray manager not implemented
high_priority_github_issues.description: System tray manager at apps/backend/src/core/desktop/tray_manager.py has 4 methods raising NotImplementedError. System tray functionality is not available. Estimated effort: 12h

high_priority_github_issues.title: HIGH: Deprecated economy transaction method incomplete
high_priority_github_issues.description: The process_transaction method in apps/backend/src/economy/economy_manager.py is deprecated with incomplete logic. Need to either complete or remove. Estimated effort: 2h

high_priority_github_issues.title: MEDIUM: Context system has 7+ incomplete imports
high_priority_github_issues.description: Context system demo at apps/backend/src/ai/context/demo_context_system.py has 7+ incomplete imports. Need to complete module structure. Estimated effort: 8h

high_priority_github_issues.title: MEDIUM: Migrate from legacy Keras API
high_priority_github_issues.description: Multiple files use TF_USE_LEGACY_KERAS environment variable. Need to migrate to Keras 3.0 API across tools, compatibility layer, and model training. Estimated effort: 16h total

immediate_actions: Implement ToolDispatcher to restore tool routing functionality
Implement error handler to enable proper error handling
Review and prioritize stub implementations for core functionality
short_term_actions: Complete HSP fallback protocols for resilient communication
Implement actual image generation with Stable Diffusion or DALL-E
Complete context system imports and structure
long_term_actions: Migrate from legacy Keras API to Keras 3.0
Implement ML-based AI Ops features (anomaly detection, predictive maintenance)
Implement advanced NLP features for HAM memory (radicals, POS tagging)
Review and modernize legacy code (key manager, MCP types)
recommendations.debt_tracking_process: Use GitHub issues with 'technical-debt' label. Track progress weekly. Prioritize Critical/High severity items. Allocate 20% of sprint capacity to debt reduction.
